message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $90 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hey Bob, I appreciate your offer.  $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to come down to $95.  What do you think?
